main event: A civilian UFO sighting occurred in Turkey on 1 Mar 62, involving a radar object observed for about 2-3 minutes before it disappeared.
interesting points: The object appeared from a 35° angle and disappeared at about 30°,The object seemed to vary in size and had unsteady blinking lights,The sighting was classified as 'Unidentified' by project officials,There was no possibility to check the object or confirm its details,The object was suggested to possibly be a high-flying balloon or similar phenomena.
sighted object: a radar object with blinking lights
witness description: a ground observer reporting the sighting
